com.threadteam.thread.popups

Class ShareServerPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threadteam.thread.popups.ShareServerPopup

  • public class ShareServerPopup
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the Share Server Popup for server activities.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Eugene Long

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.view.ViewGroup baseLayer
      The base layer that the popup should be displayed on.

        Displays hints for how to use the server share code.

      • CodeExpiryTextView

        private android.widget.TextView CodeExpiryTextView
        Displays how much time remains until the server share code resets.

      • sharesListener

        final com.google.firebase.database.ValueEventListener sharesListener
        Verifies that there is no identical share code to the current share code in the shares tree. Reattempts the generation and verification of a new share code should a duplicate be found. Otherwise, pairs the server share code with the current server id if successful, and updates the view accordingly. Database Path: root/shares/(shareCode) Usage: Single ValueEventListener

      • codeTimeout

        final android.os.CountDownTimer codeTimeout
        Countdown timer for the server share code's expiry

                        java.lang.String _serverId)
        Constructor for the Share Server Popup.
        Parameters:
        _baseLayer - The base layer that the popup should be displayed on.
        _context - The current context.
        _ref - The DatabaseReference of the current activity.
        _serverId - The id of the current server being shared.

        public void resetCode()
        Resets the server share code to null. This always resets the view.
